message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,300,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,000,000 is significantly below my minimum. I could consider a price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1,200,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.
